bug.author: Andrej-sens
bug.description:
Hello, I have just minor question about pretrained model VGG19 in your network. In line 151-154 of file <denchmark-link:https://github.com/knazeri/edge-connect/blob/master/src/loss.py>loss.py</denchmark-link> you are using weights relu3_2 twice. <denchmark-code>for x in range(12, 14): self.relu3_2.add_module(str(x), features[x])
for x in range(14, 16): self.relu3_2.add_module(str(x), features[x]) </denchmark-code>
Doesn't it suppose to be relu3_2 for the first one and relu3_3 for next one?

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Andrej-sens>@Andrej-sens</denchmark-link> That's what it's supposed to be! Thanks for your attention. The good news is that the pre-trained weights are not affected. I just checked our development code base. There must have been a mistake in the release code.
